<p>
  The good people over at Avnet are making a one time offer, good
  to September 30th, while stocks last.
</p>
<p>
  When you order an mbed NXP LPC11U24 and an NGX mX baseboard
  together you get 50% off! Both are usually $46.60, but you get
  them both for $46.60
</p>

    <td>
      <strong>NXP LPC11U24 MCU<br></strong> Low power ARM®
      Cortex™-M0 Core<br>
      * 48MHz, 8KB RAM, 32KB FLASH<br>
      * USB Device, 2xSPI, I2C , UART, 6xADC, GPIO<br>
      <strong>Prototyping form-factor<br></strong> 40-pin 0.1"
      pitch DIP package, 54x26mm<br>
      * 5V USB, 4.5-9V supply or 2.4-3.3V battery<br>
      * Built-in USB drag 'n' drop FLASH programmer<br>
      <strong>mbed.org Developer Website<br></strong> Lightweight
      Online Compiler<br>
      * High level C/C++ SDK<br>
      * Cookbook of published libraries and projects
    </td>
    <td>
      <strong>Features<br></strong> 115mm x 155mm<br>
      * Power supply: DC 7.5V with power LED<br>
      * On-board regulators (+3.3V/500mA,+5v/500mA)<br>
      * Extension headers for all microcontroller pins<br>
      <strong>Connectors<br></strong> USB B-type connector<br>
      * 2x RS232 port, VGA, SD/MMC, RJ45<br>
      <strong>Peripherals<br></strong> 256kb I2C based EEPROM<br>
      * Audio power amplifier with audio jack<br>
      * 2x16 character LCD<br>
      * Buzzer
    </td>
  </tr>
